Hi,

David is probably best placed to answer this one, but I was just
wondering if the activation function being passed in the Substrate
constructor is correct. Normally I think it would be one of the
sigmoid activation functions; as a sine function is normally used in
the underlying CPPN/genome. Apart from that method 3 looks about
right.

Colin
